forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Chance of a morning shower. Partly cloudy. High 13C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Chance of a morning shower. Sun and clouds mixed. High around 55F. SSE winds shifting to NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 6C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 43F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 57F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with rain showers in the evening becoming steadier overnight. Low near 10C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, becoming a steady rain overnight. Windy. Low around 50F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High near 55F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 7C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 44F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. Thunder possible. High around 10C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional light rain. Thunder possible. High 51F. SSE winds shifting to W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 4C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 39F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sun and a few passing clouds. High 13C. ESE winds shifting to NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High 56F. ESE winds shifting to NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low 3C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low 37F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun early, then becoming cloudy later in the day. High around 15C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun early, then becoming cloudy later in the day. High 59F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low 6C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low 43F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High around 15C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 58F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 8C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 46F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 14C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 57F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 7C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low near 45F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 16C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High around 60F. SSE winds shifting to W at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with a few showers. Low 8C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with a few showers. Low 46F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High near 15C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High 58F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
